result.title: Флойд
result.content:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair <int, int> pii;

#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

int n;
int g[100][100];
int p[100][100];
const int INF = 1000000000;
vector<int> path;

int main()
{
	cin >> n;
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){
			cin >> g[i][j];
			p[i][j] = i;
		}
	}
	
	for(int k = 0; k < n; k++){
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
			for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){
				if(g[i][j] > g[i][k]){
					g[i][j] = g[i][k] + g[k][j];
					p[i][j] = p[k][j];
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	vector<int> path;
	int start, fin;
	cin >> start >> fin;
	start--, fin--;
	
	path.pb(fin);
	
	for(int v = p[start][fin]; v != start; v = p[start][v]){
		path.pb(v);
	}
	path.pb(start);
	reverse(path.begin(), path.end());
	
	for(auto u: path){
		cout << u << ' ';
	}
	

	
    return 0;
}
